___

### setup

```{r message = F, warning = F}
library(tidyverse)
options(digits = 22, scipen = 999)
```

### solution

```{r}
ways = c(1, rep(0, times = 200))

for (i in c(1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200)) {
  for (j in i:200) {
    ways[j + 1] = ways[j + 1] + ways[j + 1 - i]
  }
}

ways[length(ways)]
```
